metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13093 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in fs/xfs/xfs_icache.c in the Linux kernel through4.17.3. There is a NULL pointer dereference and panic in lookup_slow() on aNULL inode->i_ops pointer when doing pathwalks on a corrupted xfs image.This occurs because of a lack of proper validation that cached inodes arefree during allocation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
